title: Game crash
body: my game just crash before the load screen begin in ranked flex WTF is going on I try to reconnect and its say corrupted files detected and there is some update 1% 4 mins what is going on on this game am I gona get baned for something I didn't done?

replies.body: Your files may have corrupt during a patch or client update, or your drivers could be acting up too.  Your best bet is to let the patcher scan for corrupted files and let it perform repairs.  Canceling or closing it can cause your patcher to scan all of your game files for corruption all over again.  If the issue persists, our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide can help get this fixed up.  Let me know if you have any questions.

one more thing can you please tell me if I can somehow delete the new league client update ? and I got ban for 5 games because my game crash to scan the files I didn't mean to leave the game will this somehow effect my account??
